title: Componentized page

repo:path.description: Shows the hierarchy of the page. The path semantics should be same as that defined in [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#section-3.3). In case a repository is not path based then it can return the information which will help in browsing. It could be just an document id, or something like `{catalog}/{id}` in case of a document database.

repo:name.description: Name of the page in the repository. This could be a file name or any name provided by the repository to the page.

xdm:shortTitle.description: Short title of the page that is suitable to be displayed in navigation links.

xdm:unlisted.description: Indicates if this page should be hidden by default in navigational collections.

xdm:template.description: The template that was used to create this page.

xdm:language.description: Specifies the language of this page. the language property should conform to BPC 47, for example `en-GB`.

xdm:navOrder.description: When this page is shown in a collection of pages, use `nav_order` to sort. The smallest `nav_order` should be the first item in the sorted collection.

residuals.description: Defines the set of residual properties allowed on a page or component.
